content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **there s a pdf pattern in english which provides an easy to follow step-by-step crochet instructions a detailed photo tutorial and a video tutorial** about the pattern the iris granny square blanket pattern is a modern granny square blanket that is made using the beautiful iris stitch instead of using the classic granny square pattern we are using the double-v_stitch for the iris stitch in the round the blanket can be made to any size you want with a simple repetition skill level - easy crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed - optional - hooks size needed 5 0 mm / h - the blanketwas crocheted with worsted #4 weight yarn although it can be made with any yarn weight and a suitable hook - total amount of yarn needed 250 gr / 530 yds / 485 finished size - 32x32 81x81cm - after blocking ** the blanket can be worked to a larger size by repeating the pattern if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2026 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
